title: How can a weak student become a top student? What are some tips for studying and writing answers that will score high marks? - Quora

response.answer_text: Academics isn’t the end goal of life. It would be a far better idea to develop skills useful in the real world than trying to compete in a stupid rat race. You will probably end up more successful and employable than your academically better colleagues by focusing of skill needed in the real world. The best way to beat someone smarter is to study something that they never study.

Coming from a student who has been both strong and weak (in terms of marks) at various levels of education, not all weak (so called) students are the same .... just like not all good students are the same ... this question is too general and can not be asked unless specific information is given ...
